Class FlavouredPizza

extends Pizza

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlavouredPizza

        public FlavouredPizza(Canvas win,
                      double startX,
                      double startY,
                      double pizzaSize,
                      java.lang.String crustOption,
                      boolean changeSauce,
                      int number)
        Constructor for the flavoured pizza class.
        Parameters:
        win - the window to draw the pizza on
        startX - the top-left x coordinate for the section of screen to draw pizza on
        startY - the top-left y coordinate for the section of screen to draw pizza on
        pizzaSize - the size of the pizza base
        crustOption - the chosen crust type
        changeSauce - if true changes the base sauce to BBQ
        number - the number of the pizza

                       int type)
        Method to determine which topping to add to the pizza.
        Parameters:
        number - The number of the topping (1 or 2)
        type - the type of topping(tuna or pepper)
